name: Weight tracker
description: Accept a set of manual entries of weight measurements taken at different dates, can plot a graph, and can allow to track multiple entities, for example more than one person weight.
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Calculator
description: A standard calculator: numbers, +, -, *, /, and the result. Try to speed run it, or, hell, learn a new language or framework with it.
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Book database
description: Enter the books you own, the books youâ€™d like to buy, store the book info, images. Add extra metadata from Goodreads
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Recipes
description: Enter a name, a description with the steps. Have pictures and some ranking for difficulty and quality. Add the time needed. Have different steps with a picture for each. Store them somewhere
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Bill tracker
description: Log bills, amounts and date. List bills. Have a few graphs (this year / last year)
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Expenses tracker
description: Log expenses, tag them (or have categories). List expenses. Have a few graphs (last month / last year)
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Chat
description: Some sort of stripped-down Slack. People enter without authentication and are assigned a name, stored for when they come back. Store the history. Add notifications
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Notes
description: Add a new note. List all your notes in the sidebar
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Personal diary
description: Add entries with a date and text. Entries have a date. Show more recent entries first. Attach pictures
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Pomodoro/Timer
description: Enter a time. Start timer. Alert when the time is over
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Meme generator
description: Have 10 popular meme images. Let the user add text to them and output an image + text. Store the meme history
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Blog engine
description: Allow admin to login and add posts. Visitors can add comments
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: QA engine
description: Allow users to login. Allow adding questions. Allow answering questions. Allow original user choosing the best question
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Forum engine
description: Allow users to login. Allow users to add posts. Allow users to comment on posts
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Hacker News client
description: List the popular posts. Show a post + comments. Show user profiles. Search HN
author: Momchil Georgiev

name: Reddit client
description: List the popular posts. List post + comments. Show user profiles
author: Momchil Georgiev
